quality_metrics.name: Contributing File
quality_metrics.feedback: Failure: To pass this metric, your cookbook metadata must include a source url, the source url must be in the form of http://github.com/user/repo, and your repo must contain a CONTRIBUTING.md file

quality_metrics.name: Supported Platforms
quality_metrics.feedback: hostsfile should declare what platform(s) it supports.

quality_metrics.name: Collaborator Number
quality_metrics.feedback: Failure: Cookbook has 1 collaborators. A cookbook must have at least 2 collaborators to pass this metric.

quality_metrics.name: License
quality_metrics.feedback: hostsfile has a recognized open source license.

quality_metrics.name: No Binaries
quality_metrics.feedback: passed the No Binaries metric. Contains no obvious binaries.

quality_metrics.feedback: Failure: To pass this metric, your cookbook metadata must include a source url, the source url must be in the form of http://github.com/user/repo, and your repo must contain a TESTING.md file
